loans.name: Justina

texts.en:
Justina K.  is a trader who sells building materials like cement. She is a single parent of 2 children. Sales are increasing but she lacks enough capital to buy more cement to meet the demand of her customers.

She is requesting $525 as an additional fund to purchase more cement for sale.

loans.use: Additional funds to purchase more cement for sale.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica A. is single and has one child.  She supports her child buy selling food products and rice at Abura market in Cape Coast.  She is requesting a loan of $525 to buy additional food products to stock her food stand.  Veronica hopes this loan will increase her profits.

Veronica is also a member of a lending group called “Faith Group”, which consists of 11 members in Cape Coast, Ghana

loans.use: To buy additional food products to stock her food stand.

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica A. is single and has one child.  She supports her child buy selling food products and rice at Abura market in Cape Coast.  She is requesting a loan of $525 to buy additional food products to stock her food stand.  Veronica hopes this loan will increase her profits.

Veronica is also a member of a lending group called “Faith Group”, which consists of 11 members in Cape Coast, Ghana

loans.use: To buy additional food products to stock her food stand.

loans.name: Memuna

texts.en:
Memuna H.  is in the business of food production and sales. She prepares rice and beans cooked together which is popularly called ‘Wakye’. She also prepares plain rice and stew for sale. Her business is doing well but she lacks enough funds to increase her production.

She is requesting $525 for additional capital to buy more raw materials for her food production in order  to meet her increasing customer base.

loans.use: As  additional capital to buy more raw materials for her food production in order  to meet her increasing customer base.

loans.name: Valeriana

texts.en:
Valerina is a single woman who owns a bar. The bar is named after her only son who died, Alberto. Thanks to the support of her friends and family she did not fall into a deep depression.

Today the bar is her greatest work. She serves over a hundred customers a day and wants to expand the menu of the bar and what they offer. Valerina is looking to make it into more of a restaurant and bar. With the loan Valerina will buy a selection of meats, ice creams, more variety of drinks, oils, rice and pasta.

loans.use: To buy merchandise like chicken, meat, ice cream, oils, rice, noodles, and general drinks.

loans.name: Asare

texts.en:
Asare O. is 40 years old and is married with no children.  For the past 3 years he has been running a small road-side shop selling hardware.  His shop is located by an auto-repair yard as well as a large carpentry business, so his sales are increasing.  He is requesting a loan of $525 to expand his hardware product line to supply the increased requests he is receiving.  

Asare is also a member of a lending group called “Faith Group”, which consists of 11 members in Cape Coast, Ghana.

loans.use: To expand his hardware product line to supply the increased requests he is receiving.

loans.name: Monica

texts.en:
Monica F. runs a food stand at Cape Coast Polytechnic.  She makes traditional Ghanaian dishes for students and has many customers.  Pictured next to her are wrappings for “kenkey”, which is made of plantains and corn.  She is requesting a loan of $525 to buy plantains and corn in bulk to reduce her costs.

Monica is also a member of a lending group called “Faith Group”, which consists of 11 members in Cape Coast, Ghana.

loans.use: To buy plantains and corn in bulk to reduce her costs.

loans.name: Gertrude

texts.en:
Gertrude D.  business is the production of food and its sales.  She is married and has 4 children. She plans on increasing her production and sale but currently lacks adequate funds.

She is requesting a $525 loan as additional capital to buy more food stuffs and other food items for her food production.

loans.use: Additional capital to buy more food stuffs and other food items for food production.

loans.name: Tennee

texts.en:
Tennee M. is 30 years old and is married to a taxi driver.  For the past 4 years she has run a shop at Abura market selling plastic bags as well as bags for traders to transport their goods.  Business owners throughout Abura market buy their bags from Tennee to put their products into.  She is requesting $525 to buy bags from a wholesaler at a discounted price.

Tennee is the group leader of a lending group called “Faith Group”, which consists of 11 members in Cape Coast, Ghana.

loans.use: To buy bags from a wholesaler at a discounted price.

loans.name: Dorothy

texts.en:
Dorothy E.  is a trader who sells farm products like plantain, Banana. She is also a fishmonger who buys the fish from the fishermen, brings them home for processing and then later sells them to her costumers. She wishes to increase her sales in order to meet the increasing demand of her customers.

She is requesting a loan of $525 as an additional capital to buy more fish for processing and sale.

loans.use: As additional capital to buy more fish for processing and sale.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth A.  is a trader who prefers to walk to her customers and sell her goods to them. She sells cosmetics and babywear. She is married to a driver and has 2 children.
She wants to increase her sales so as to increase her income.

She is requesting a loan of $525 as an addition source of funding to invest in her trade.

loans.use: As additional source of funding to invest in her trade.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana lives and has a business selling Juane in the city of Tarapoto, San Martin.  Juane is a food typical of the region and culture of the Peruvian jungle most often made of rice and chicken wrapped in palm leaf.  Ana is from Moyobamba where they add extra spices to their Juane. She continues to use this recipe and has received rave reviews. Ana has sold her Juane in Tarapoto for five years and now has numerous loyal customers. They tell her she has the tastier Juane in town.

Ana is 33 years old, married, and has 2 children. She started the business to help her family and take charge of her life. She wakes up at 5 a.m. every morning to go sell her Juane in the main market. She returns home at lunch to start preparing her Juane for the next day. Ana is happy she can provide a better life and more opportunities for her children.

A member of the community bank Las Orquideas, Ana is requesting a loan of S/. 800 to repay over 6 months. She would like to use the extra capital to buy oil, rice, chicken, pork, yucca, and corn. With the extra money Ana will be able to serve her ever increasing cliental. Ana hopes to buy a computer for her children in the near future.

loans.use: She will buy oil, rice, chicken, pork, yucca and corn.

loans.name: Dany

texts.en:
Dany runs a food stand in the neighborhood of Parta Alta in the city of Tarapoto, San Martin. She sells “Juane” (rice and chicken wrapped in palm leaf), Fried Rice, French Fries, and Hot Dogs. She prepares her foods daily to sell in the evening on the corner of a busy intersection near her house.  

Dany is 36 years old, married, and has 2 children. Her children are young so she is happy she can work from home and spend time with them. She started the business 5 years ago to help earn money for her family and gain some independence. She now has many loyal customers and an active social life.  She says she gets to meet people from all over the region which she really enjoys. One day she would like to save enough money to send her children to University.

A member of the community bank Las Orquidias, Dany is requesting a loan of S/. 800 to repay over 6 months. With the loan she would like to buy new tables, plates, and cups so she can serve more clients.

loans.use: She would like tu buy new tables, plates, and cups

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jaqueline has a general store in Tarapotillo, San Martin. Tarapotillo is a neighborhood outside the city of Tarapoto. In the store she sells fruits, vegetables, rice, oil, sodas, hygiene products and much more. Clients are happy they can buy the majority of their goods from Jaqueline instead of walking all the way into Tarapoto.  

Jaqueline is 33 years old, married, and has one young child. She started the store 8 years ago in the living room of her home. She has recently built a room especially for the store with shelves and display cases. She loves being able to work from home and care for her child. One day Jaqueline dreams of sending her child to a University.

A member of the community bank Mujeres Decididas, Jaqueline is requesting a loan of S/. 1,000 to repay over 6 months. She will use the loan to restock her shelves with the goods the population of Tarapotillo love.

loans.use: She will use the loan to restock her shelves

loans.name: Teresa Isabel

texts.es:
Mrs. Teresa C. is a 72 year-old woman of mixed heritage.  She was born in Bluefields.  She has four adult children and she lives with her daughter-in-law and grand-daughter.  Mrs. Teresa Chazez has owned a small grocery store for 30 years, which enabled her to support her children.  This business continues to enable her to cover her personal expenses and provide support to her daughter-in-law and grand-daughter.

Little miss Teresa, as she is known by her neighbors, receives a good amount of business due to the long service she has provided and the wide variety of products she offers.  This micro-entrepreneur requires a loan in order to increase her sales.  Teresa intends to purchase the following:

Two 100 kilo sacks of beans at $64 apiece.
Two 100 kilo sacks of “American” rice at $44 dollars apiece.
Two 100 kilo sacks of sugar at $28 apiece.
Three drums of cooking oil at $32 apiece.
Two boxes of milk at $62 a box.
Four juice spouts for $8 each.
Three cartons of eggs at $36 apiece.
Ten dozen university ruled notebooks at $6 a dozen.
Five boxes of soap at $10 a box.
Three boxes of butter at $21 a box.
And, two boxes of dairy milk at $52 a box.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva volunteer.


La señora Teresa C. es originaria de Bluefields, tiene 72 años de edad, tiene 4 hijos todos mayores de edad, es de origen mestiza costeña, vive con su nuera y su nieta. Doña Teresa tiene una pulperia desde hace 30 años, con la cual saco adelante a todos sus hijos. Actualmente este negocio le permite pagar sus gastos personales y ayudarle a su nuera y nieta. Doña Teresita como es conocida en su sector es bastante visitada por ser uno de los negocios mas viejos que existe en ese sector y por ofrecer variedad de productos. Esta microempresaria requiere un financiamiento para incrementar sus ventas, solicita comprar lo siguiente:  Comprar 2 quintales de Frijoles a US$ 64 dolares cada quintal, 2 quintales de arroz americano a US$ 44 dolares cada quintal, 2 quintales de azucar a US$ 28 dolares cada quintal, 3 bidones de aceite a US$ 32 dolares cada bidon, 2 cajas de leche pinito a US$ 62 dolares cada caja, 4 tapas de jugo a US$ 8 dolares cada tapa, 3 cajillas de huevo a US$ 36 dolares cada cajilla, 10 docenas de cuadernos universitariosa US$ 6 dolares cada docena, 5 cajas de jabon a US$ 10 dolares cada caja, 3 cajas de mantequilla a US$ 21 dolares cada caja y 2 cajas de leche la lechera a US$ 52 dolares cada caja.

loans.use: Purchase of grocery items to restock her store.

payments.comment: La cuota real de pago es de $74.70 dólares
La cuota real es de US$ 74.70
La cuota real de pago es de $ 74.70 dólares.
La cuota real es de $ 74.70 dólares
Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Kuña Katupyry Of Paraguari Group

texts.en:
In the city of Paraguari there is a group of women entrepreneurs that meet and work with one another. They all have different independent businesses but work together with the Fundación Paraguaya to gain loans to increase their businesses. There are twenty women in the group and all of them are working to support their families and keep their children in school.

Over time that they have worked with Fundación Paraguaya, they have formed great reputations and have all the necessary qualifications. They are asking for a loan today to increase the goods which they sell, therefore increase their profits. With the money they will buy clothing, fabric, sewing materials, food and refreshments.

loans.use: The money will be used to buy fabric, thread, meats, refreshments, milk, rice, oil, pasta, flour, baking soda, and clothing to sell in their respective businesses.

loans.name: Rowith

texts.en:
Rowith has a successful business making bed and sofa covers. She runs her business from a room in her house in the neighborhood of Parta Alta in the city of Tarapoto, San Martin. She started the business six years ago after taking a sewing class at a local institute. Her business has grown rapidly. She only uses the highest quality fabrics and materials. She now has many loyal customers and often needs to hire help. Her clients do all the advertising for her.

Rowith is active, organized, and charismatic. She is 44 years old, happily married, and has 4 children. She runs a female volleyball team and is the president of her community bank. She has gained a lot of confidence in the past few years and now has plans to start other businesses. She has just entered another class to learn how to make different types of jewelry and decorations for parties. Her children share her passion for life and are all involved in the community and school.

The president of the community bank Las Orquidias, Rowith is requesting a loan of S/. 3,000 to repay over 6 months. With the loan she would like to buy fabrics, elastic, and buttons.

loans.use: She would like to buy fabrics, elastic and buttons

loans.name: Flor

texts.en:
Flor sells fruit in the main market of Tarapoto, San Martin. She’s had her business for 3 years. It has grown yearly and now she has many loyal customers. At the stand she rents from the municipality, Flor sells bananas, oranges, guava, guanabanas, and mandarins.

Flor is 51 years old, has 3 children, and married. She is glad she started her business. Now she has a lot of friends, greater independence outside of the home, and can help pay for her children’s education. She doesn’t argue as much with her husband as she has more control over her family’s expenses.

A member of the community bank Las Orquideas, Flor is requesting a loan of S/. 1,500 to repay over 6 months. With the extra capital Flor would like to buy more fruit and start to sell Juane (chicken and rice wrapped in palm leaf).

loans.use: She would like to buy more fruit and start to sell juane

loans.name: Paquita Angelica

texts.en:
Paquita Angelica has a business making “Cecina” (smoked pork) and pork sausage. She lives in the neighborhood Parta Alta in the city of Tarapoto, San Martin. She prepares her meats in her house and sells them in the region of San Martin and often takes orders from friends living in Lima and Iquitos. She started the business four years ago with $50 and a pig after years of running a business selling shoes. Although she didn’t have any experience making sausage she worked hard and learned quickly.

Paquita is 51 years old, happily married, and has 4 children. Three of her children are grown and the other is studying hard to become a professional. She started the business because she knew their would be a market for delicious sausage and she wanted to work from home. Although she is very busy and has many responsibilities her family is first priority. She organizes carefully so she can have time to spend with them.

A member of the community bank Las Orquideas, Paquita is requesting a loan of S/. 2,000 to repay over 6 months. With the money she will buy pigs so she can make more sausage. She dreams of continuing to grow until she has her own store and butcher shop.

loans.use: She wil buy pigs

loans.name: Nyai Arsih

texts.en: Nyai, 40, is married to N. and has 4 children. They produce tempe (fermented soy) at their house. They boil soybeans, put them into plastic bags, and then they sell them the next day at the market, earning $50 a day. To add to their business capital they are asking for a loan of $100. As a member of MBK, she will repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Add to her business capital

loans.name: Dasmah

texts.en: Dasmah, 37, is a mother of 2 children. She has a grocery store at her house where she sells snacks, daily needs, etc., earning $20 a day. Her husband, D., work as a door-to-door household salesman on credit. He has to collect the payments weekly, and he earns $25 a week. She needs to add to both her and her husband's business capital. She is a member of MBK and is asking for a loan of $100, and she is willing to repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Add to business capital

loans.name: Yeyet Mulyeti

texts.en: Yeyet, 29, is married to D. and has one child, age 8. Everyday she sells fresh fish at her house while her husband sells them door-to-door around places. They can earn $20 a day. She is a member of MBK and is now asking for a loan of $75 to expand her business. She will repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Elsa Maria

texts.es:
Mrs. Elsa is a 54 year-old married woman. Her husband works as a technician at a telecommunications plant. They have two adult daughters who are trained to work in the professional sector, but are currently unemployed.

Seeing herself in a difficult economic situation and recognizing the general lack of jobs in the country, Elsa decided to open her own business. This business is a small grocery/general store which she installed in her home along with the help of her husband. Elsa attends and manages the store, and at times is assisted by her daughters as well.

With a great deal of sacrifice these two parents have been able to educate and train their daughters to work in the professional world. It has been a great joy for them to see their daughters arrive at the point this point. They were only able to provide for their daughters’ education through the combined work of husband at the telecommunications plant and the wife in her general store. The store has enabled the family to have all of the necessities, and has bettered their quality of life.

The family is planning to develop the stores’ product line. To this purpose Elsa requests a loan with which she will purchase dairy products, perishable goods, personal hygiene products, and other items demanded by her clients.

Translated from Spanish by Casey Unrein, Kiva volunteer.

Doña Elsa tiene 54 años de edad, es casada, su esposo se desempeña como técnico en planta de telecomunicaciones, tiene 2 hijas, las cuales ya son mayores de edad y profesionales, pero se encuentran sin empleo. Viéndose en una difícil situación económica y la falta de oportunidades de empleos en el país, la señora decide emprender su propio negocio, el cual es una pequeña pulpería que instaló en su vivienda con apoyo de su esposo, la cual ella misma atiende y administra, en ocasiones sus hijas le ayudan. Con mucho sacrificio estos padres lograron preparar a sus 2 hijas, la mayor satisfacción será verlas hechas unas profesionales. Esto lo pudieron lograr con el trabajo del señor y los ingresos que perciben del negocio. El negocio le ha permitido a esta familia vivir con lo necesario, han ido mejorando su nivel de vida y piensan desarrollar una miscelánea. Para esto la señora solicita un préstamo para poder comprar productos alimenticios, lácteos, perecederos y de higiene personal, que tanto demandan sus clientes.

loans.use: Increase the inventory of her grocery/general store.

loans.name: Ernawati

texts.en: Ernawati, 31, is married to D. and has one child, age 8. D. works as a bus driver and earns $25 a week. To add to her family income, she helps her husband by selling sheets, blankets, mats, etc., on credit door-to-door, and she earns $10 a day. She is requesting a loan of $75 to add to her business capital. She is a member of MBK and is willing to repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Add to her business capital

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es:
Doña Martha is a specialist in beauty. She is a single mother with 2 children to feed and raise, so she decided to use her knowledge about cosmetics - which she obtained when she was very young - to work. She was able to find some capital with which to start her beauty salon, which is located in her home. Thanks to her good service and personalized attention she was able to acquire a good number of customers who visit her frequently. This same business allowed her to develop an Academy of Cosmetology. Given the talent she developed over thirty years of experience, her customers themselves desired to learn about beauty from her. The success of her business has allowed her to finance an improvement of the infrastructure of the place in which it is located, thus making it more pleasant. She has also expanded the service offered to include spa treatments and massages. Doña Martha wants to buy accessories for her Academy, since the students now need to practice what they have learned.

Translated from the Spanish by Susanna Heinz, Kiva Volunteer.

Doña Martha es una especialista en el ramo de la belleza, siendo madre soltera y con 2 hijos a quien alimentar y sacar adelante, decide poner en práctica los conocimientos de belleza que adquirió desde muy joven, es con un financiamiento como emprende su salón de belleza, el cual ella misma atendía en su casa de habitación. Debido a su buen servicio y atención personalizada logra captar un buen número de clientes fieles que la visitan frecuentemente. El mismo negocio le permitió desarrollar una Academia de Belleza, debido al talento que la señora ha desarrollado, ya que son 30 años de experiencia con los que cuenta, sus mismas clientas deseaban aprender y actualmente, ella misma es la que brinda los cursos a jóvenes y mujeres adultas en el ramo de belleza. El mismo negocio le ha permitido mejorar la infraestructura del local, acondicionando el Salón y la Academia bajos condiciones agradables, además de expandir las líneas del servicio que ofrece como es Spa y Masajes. La señora desea comprar accesorios de belleza para la academia, ya que sus alumnas necesitan poner en práctica los conocimientos adquiridos en cada etapa del proceso de enseñanza.

loans.use: Purchasing dryer, iron, combs, scissors, razors and brushes

loans.name: Neneng

texts.en: Neneng, 29, is a widow and has 1 child, age 6. Her husband passed away several years ago because of an illness. Since then she has had to work by herself to earn income for her and her child. Everyday she goes around selling floor mattresses on credit, earning $5 a day. Now she is asking for a loan of $75 to expand her business so she could earn more income for her child's education. She is a member of MBK and is willing to repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Aída

texts.es:
Aida is a courageous and valiant woman; these qualities have helped her to daily face the problems that arise from economic shortages. She begins working very early in the morning and as soon as she’s completed her household chores, she quickly goes to buy the necessary items for her little store. During the morning and afternoon hours she sells anticuchos (Andean kebabs), making use of the space with a small grill. With this diligently worked source of income she has been able to maintain and provide security and well being for nine long years to her children. Her main reason for working has always been to help her children fulfill their dreams. This is why she is asking for a loan, to improve her little store with better products.

Translated from Spanish by Lizella West, Kiva volunteer.

Aída, es una mujer de mucho coraje y valentía, estas cualidades la ayudan a enfrentar día a día los problemas de escasez económica; trabaja desde muy temprano y al concluir las labores propias de su hogar, acude con mucha rapidez a comprar lo necesario para iniciar la atención en su pequeño espacio de ventas..Gran parte de la mañana y por la tarde también oferta anticuchos, valiéndose de este espacio, con la ayuda de una pequeña parrilla, con esta fuente de ingresos en la que se desempeña diligentemente ha podido mantener y brindarle seguridad y bienestar a sus hijos durante nueve largos años.Su propósito de trabajo siempre tiene un solo objetivo colaborar con el cumplimiento de los sueños de sus queridos hijos. Por esa razón solicita un préstamo a fin de implementar con mejores productos su pequeño establecimiento de ventas.

loans.use: Increase of capital to buy a larger quantity of products for her small store.

loans.name: Rosa Argentina

texts.es:
Rosa C. is 47 years old, lives in the Sabana Grande neighborhood, and has a son who is now independent. She was able to raise him with the work she learned from her mother, which her mother learned from Rosa's grandmother. From Rosa's grandmother's time, the family business has been the baking and selling of pastries. She also makes and sells tortillas. These activities have supported her grandmother, her mother, and, now, Rosa herself. Nowadays she has taught her business to a young woman who she practically raised so that the young woman can inherit her business since her son is doing other work. With the loan, she wants to buy more corn, oil, firewood and other ingredients necessary for the production of her goods so that she can expand her business.

Translated from the Spanish by Susanna Heinz, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Rosa C., tiene 47 años de edad, habita en el barrio Sabana Grande, es una señora con un hijo ya mayor e independiente a quien logro criar y formar con el trabajo que aprendió de su madre y que su madre aprendió de su abuela. Desde la época de su abuelita el negocio familiar ha sido la ELABORACION Y VENTA DE COSA DE HORNO, esta es una repostería con un exquisito sabor, tambie´n se dedica a la elaboración y venta de torillas, estas actividades han sustentado las necesidades del hogar de su abuela, su señora madre y ahora de ella misma, Actualmente tiene una joven a quien prácticamente ha criado y le ha enseñado este negocio para que sea quien lo herede ya que su hijo varón se dedica a otra actividad. Con la solicitud de Préstamo quiere comprar en mayor cantidad maíz,manteca, leña y otros ingredientes propios de su producto en vista que quiere expandirse a vender a pulperías dentro y fuera de su comunidad.

loans.use: Purchasing corn, oil, firewood, etc.

loans.name: María

texts.es:
Maria is an example of a women that always comes out on top no matter the difficulty. She can also be qualified as a person with a lust for life and enjoys every moment that life offers. She works where needed, whether it be lending her hand in the fields, selling local prepared dishes, selling milk, or providing laundry services. Her main line of work, however, is sewing clothes; which she does in small space of her home with a sewing machine she paid for with a lot of hard work. She loves to sit in front of her shop and sew clothes which she sells at the local markets in her city. She is using this opportunity to ask for your help to stock her little shop with raw materials in different colors and qualities and thus optimize and increase her production.

Translated from Spanish by Lizella West, Kiva volunteer.

María, es ejemplo de una mujer que sobresale ante cualquier dificultad, se le puede calificar también como una persona con talento para vivir y disfrutar de cada momento que le otorga la vida.Su ocupación la desarrolla según la ocasión, por ejemplo, se dedica a las tareas de campo ofreciendo su mano de obra, vende en algunas ocasiones comidas típicas, también vende leche y ofrece servicios de lavado de prendas; pero sin duda la actividad principal es la de tejer prendas de vestir a máquina, las herramientas de trabajo con las que se desempeña en un pequeño espacio de su hogar las ha conseguido con mucho esfuerzo.Le satisface mucho permanecer al frente de su taller y teje faldones sin descano para ofertarlos en las ferias locales de su ciudad.En esta oportunidad recurre en búsqueda de tu ayuda para implementar su pequeño taller con materia prima de diferentes colores y calidades a fin de optimizar y acrecentar su producción.

loans.use: Injection of capital to acquire a larger quantity of raw materials and optimize the fabrication of clothing for the general public.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.es:
Gladys is a hard-working woman who, with great satisfaction, overcame the financial hardships she was born into. Her desire to raise her children, led her to open a small store in her home six years ago. Since then, her attention to customer service has turned her neighbors into some of her best customers. The increase in monthly income has allowed her to offer higher quality products and her clientele has grown exponentially because of the quality of service and confidence she offers. She'd like to take advantage of the opportunity by asking for a loan so she can increase the amount of stock in her small store to satisfy customer demand. With your help, this hard-working mother will make her dream a reality.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

Gladys, es una mujer muy trabajadora y ha superado con mucha satisfacción los momentos de escasez económica por las que venía atravesando su familia. Con el deseo de permanecer siempre al cuidado de sus pequeños decidió aperturar una pequeña tienda en las instalaciones de su hogar hace seis años, con la agradable atención que ella ofrece a sus vecinos los ha ido convirtiendo en sus mejores clientes, con las ganancias que ha ido acumulando mes a mes ha incrementado la calidad de sus productos, sin embargo tiene un pequeño inconveniente, muy agradable por cierto, la cantidad de personas que acuden diariamente a realizar las compras en este pequeña tienda se ha ido incrementando notablemente gracias a la calidad de servicio y confianza que les ofrece.Su deseo es no desaprovechar esta oportunidad y ha decidido solicitar un préstamo para incrementar la cantidad de productos en su pequeña bodeguita para complacer las peticiones de cada uno de sus clientes. Con vuestra ayuda el deseo de esta trabajadora madre hará sus sueños realidad.

loans.use: To buy stock, like basic necessities, for her store.

loans.name: Delsy

texts.es:
Rosario is a young, talented, hard-working woman. She has taken the inciative to acquire her own income and become indepent, despite the big family she comes from, and the financial burden placed on her parents with raising a big family. With her sisters' help, she moved to the city of Hauncayo where she started selling fast food to support herself while studying a few years at a prestigious occupational centre in the city. Her patience and diligence in keeping her sandwich-making counter clean has driven her to ask for a loan to acquire more ingredients in order to increase sales and consolidate her small business.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer

Rosario, es una joven talentosa y muy trabajadora, ella toma la iniciativa de emprender su propia fuente de ingreso que le permite sostenerse a raíz de la problemática que sufría su hogar por el numeroso número de sus miembros.Con la ayuda de sus hermanas se trasladó de su pueblito hasta la ciudad de Huancayo y aquí ha decidido poner un lugar de venta de comida rápida para sostenerse los estudios que ha emprendido hace un par de años en un prestigioso centro ocupacional de esta ciudad.La acogida que ha tenido gracias a su limpieza y paciencia para la preparación de estos bocadillos la conducen a solicitar un préstamo para adquirir mayor cantidad de insumos a fin de incrementar sus ventas y consolidar su pequeña empresa.

loans.use: To buy more ingredients to prepare salchipapas (french fries and sausage).

loans.name: Lusi Apriyanti

texts.en: Lusi Apriyanti, 23, is married to P. J. and has 1 child, age 6. She has a grocery store at her house where she sells mineral water, bread, snacks, and other daily needs, earning $30 a day. Her husband is selling food door to door and earns $10 a day. She is requesting a loan of $100 to add to her business capital. She is a member of MBK and is willing to repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Add to her business capital

loans.name: Guisella

texts.es:
Guisella is a daily chef of the culinary arts. Her prime motive is to improve her economic situation, and provide her dear children with a higher quality of life -- her children inspire her to work hard and improve every day. Her small resaurant has received much attention from customers and many even wait in line to get a table in order to sample the delicious stews of this devoted mother. To satisfy customer demand, Guisella is asking for a loan to renovate her establishment and offer a larger variety of dishes. Your important contribution could help her achieve this dream.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

El arte culinario que desempeña Guisella, día a día es con el propósito de mejorar la situación económica de su querido hogar y otorgarles mayor comodidad a sus queridos pequeños que la acompañan y se han convertido en la mejor excusa para su esfuerzo y progreso diario.El pequeño restaurante tarde a tarde y ahora también por las noches se abarrota de una inmensa cantidad de comensales quienes incluso esperan una mesa por largos minutos para degustar los deliciosos potajes de esta abnegada madre de familia.Para satisfacer esta inmensidad de solicitudes Guisella, solicita un préstamo a fin de mejorar su establecimiento y ofrecer mayor variedad de platillos.Tu importante ayuda podrá procurar el cumplimiento de este sueño.

loans.use: To renovate her small restaurant and buy a large amount of ingredients to satisfy client demand.

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
Paulina is a lover of the culinary arts, and as an admirer of this art and of the regional food of her country, she began her work raising guinea pigs (a regional delicacy). This very popular activity from her native town of Huancayo, provided her with extra income, which in turn, benefitted her family. In addition, with the help of her husband, she owns two cars to cover the roads between Huancayo and Oroya daily. Her husband is the chauffeur and driver of one of their cars, and as such, administrates that business. The desire of this devoted mother of one is to start a little transportation business.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

Paulina, es amante de la culinaria y como gran apasionada de este arte y la comida regional de su país, ha iniciado su labor como criadora de cuyes, esta actividad de mucha popularidad en su natal Huancayo, le está otorgando la posibilidad de obtener ingresos extras en beneficio de su querido hogar.De manera adicional con ayuda de su esposo posee dos autos para cubrir las rutas Huancayo - Oroya diariamente, debido a que su esposo es Chofer y conductor de una de las unidades que compraron en sociedad se encuentra a cargo de la administración de los mismos.El deseo de esta abnegada madre de un pequeño niño es constituir una pequeña empresa de transportes para elevar la calidad de vida de su familia.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantity of guinea pigs to sell.

loans.name: Nafsiah

texts.en: Nafsiah, 36, is married to H. who has no fixed job. They have 3 daugthers from their marriage. Since her husband could not provide regular income, she helps him by selling meatballs, coffee, fried snacks, etc., at her small food stall, and she earns $15 a day. She is a member of MBK and is now asking for a loan of $75 to expand her business so she could earn more income for her children's education. She agrees to repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Marlene

texts.es:
Marlene is a hard-working mother, preoccupied with the well-being of her family. Ten years ago, with the help of her dear husband, she installed a little store in her house in order to satisfy the basic needs of her neighbors. Her continued labor and attention to customer service have helped her become innovative in sales and offer higher quality products month to month. She has a project in mind for her little store: she'd like to convert it into a sales floor with a larger variety of products as the demand for various items has increased little by little. For this reason, she needs your urgent help to realize her most desired dream.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

Marlene, es una madre muy trabajadora y preocupada por el bienestar de su hogar. Con la ayuda de su querido esposo hace diez años instaló una pequeña bodega a fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus vecinos, con productos de primera necesidad.Su continuo trabajo y preocupación por mejorar las condiciones del servicio que brinda la han ayudado a innovar en la venta de sus productos y a ofrecer mes a mes mejores artículos.Tiene en mente el proyecto de convertir su pequeña bodega en un espacio de ventas con mayor variedad de artículos ya que la solicitud de los mismos ha ido variando y acrecentándose paulatinamente. Por esa razón solicita vuestra importante ayuda para hacer realidad su anhelado sueño.

loans.use: To buy a larger variety of articles so she can continue satisfying customer demands.

loans.name: Augusta

texts.es:
Augusta is an intelligent and valiant woman. Despite her deteriorating health, she remains optimistic that she will get better through her work. She's been selling wool in a small space in her house for 4 years. Holding this job has helped her better the economic situation at home and contribute to realizing the dreams of her 5 dear children. Due to this illness that she's been suffering greatly, she wishes to increase the quantity and variety of her products so she can put enough money together to afford undergoing short-term treatment. Let's realize her loan request so that this devoted mother can stop suffering and fill herself with joy the rest of her days.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer

Doña Augusta, es una mujer muy valiente e inteligente, a pesar de su deteriorada salud mantiene el optimismo de mejorar pronto a través de su ocupación. Hace cuatro años se dedica a la venta e lanas en un pequeño espacio de su hogar que acondicionó para esta actividad, con su desempeño ha podido mejorar notablemente la situación económica de su hogar y ha podido contribuir a la realización de los sueños de sus queridos cinco hijos.Debido a que su padecimiento ha ido empeorando tiene el deseo de incrementar la cantidad y variedad de sus productos para reunir el dinero suficiente para llevar a cabo un tratamiento en corto tiempo.Posibilitemos su petición para que pronto esta abnegada madre pueda eliminar su padecimiento y colme de mucha alegría el resto de sus días.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantitiy and variety of wools to sell from her home.

loans.name: Sumiati

texts.en: Sumiati, 42, is a mother of 4 children. She is married to I. who is a private driver earning $30 a month. She produces baby clothes then sells them on credit. She gets income from her business--$15 a week with a small profit. To add to her business capital she is asking for a loan of $75, and as a member of MBK she will repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Add to her business capital

loans.name: Edy Noemi

texts.es:
Edy is from the city of Jauja, and after having married, moved to the city of Huancayo with her dear husband. She has set up a small handmade stove to cook pigs and sell them at her city's central plaza. The important collaboration of her partner has helped this small business be possible, and little by little, individual orders have increased. Today she also offers her services to the general public. Her hopes of bettering her small oven's facilities have led her to ask for a loan to better her service and satisfactorily meet her client's orders.

Translated from Spanish by Natalie Kane, Kiva Volunteer.

Edy, procede de la ciudad de Jauja, y luego de haber contraído matrimonio con su querido esposo se mudó en su compañía a la ciudad de Huancayo, en ella instaló un pequeño horno artesanal para dedicarse a hornear cerditos para ofertarlos en la plaza central de su ciudad.La importante colaboración de su compañero ha posibilitado la consolidación de esta pequeña ocupación y poco a poco las solicitudes particulares se han ido incrementando, ahora también ofrece sus servicios de preparación al público en general.Su deseo de mejorar las instalaciones de su pequeño horno la conducen a solicitar un préstamo para mejorar su servicio y atender satisfactoriamente las solicitudes de sus clientes.

loans.use: Repair and maintain Edy's small, handmade stove

loans.name: Lino

texts.es:
Lino is a father of six and is very responsible. He wishes to get ahead in life and has the support of his loving family. He earns a living making cloaks, bedspreads, and other textiles with the help of a loom. His desire to improve the quality of his products is what drives him to request this loan. Your help will enable him to continue working towards his goal, don't forget it.

Translated from Spanish by Libertad Leal, Kiva volunteer.

Don Lino, es padre de familia de seis hijos, muy responsable y con muchos deseos de progresar contando con la importante compañía y apoyo de su querida familia. Se dedica ala fabricación de mantos, colchas y demás con ayuda de un telar.La idea de mejorar la calidad de sus productos, lo conducen a solicitar un préstamo para poner en marcha su gran anhelo.Tu importante ayuda posibilitará este hecho, no lo olvides.

loans.use: Purchase of higher quality raw material to improve his products.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen is a mother who is very committed to the progress of her family. Despite having had to fight a lot to achieve her family's well being, she has not relinquished any of her dreams nor has she changed her way of thinking. As of always, she has thought that effort and patience are the best allies of the women in her country. For this reason and thanks to this way of thinking, she is very happy, given that she was able to install her own ice cream factory at her house with the help of a freezer that her father got for her. Her delicious and solicited ice creams are found in a large part of the city since she distributes them to small vendors. Her hopes of bettering the quality of her products and creating new flavors have spurred her to ask for a loan to purchase a mixer and to repair her great freezer.

Translated from Spanish by Natalie Kane, Kiva Volunteer.

Carmen, es una madre muy comprometida con el progreso de su familia, a pesar de haber tenido que luchar mucho por alcanzar el bienestar de su familia, no ha mitigado cada uno de sus deseos ni ha cambiado su forma de pensar.Ella desde siempre ha pensado que el esfuerzo y paciencia son las mejores aliadas de las mujeres de su país, por esa razón ahora gracias a este pensamiento está muy contenta ya que ha podido instalar su propia fábrica de helados en casa con la ayuda de una máquina congeladora que le obsequió para trabajar su querido padre.Sus deliciosos y cotizados helados los encontramos en gran parte de la ciudad, ya que los distribuye a pequeños comerciantes. Su deseo de mejorar la calidad de los mismos e innovar los sabores hacen que solicite un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de una batidora y el refaccionamiento de su gran congeladora.

loans.use: Purchase a mixer and repair her freezer

loans.name: Irma

texts.es:
Irma is a very diligent mother who has worked in different fields throughout her life but always with the security and well-being of her beloved children as her main goal. Her constant search for sustenance drove her to open a small general store in a commercial property she rented in the downtown area. She named it "Los Gemelos" (the twins) in honor of her children. She works in her store every day and has now decided to increase her capital in order to stock her store with a higher quantity and better quality of products. She hopes that this will satisfy her clients' needs.

Translated from Spanish by Libertad Leal, Kiva volunteer.

Irma, es una diligente madre de familia que a lo largo de su vida ha desarrollado diferentes actividades con el único propósito de otorgarles bienestar y seguridad a sus queridos hijos.Su constante observación y búsqueda de sustento la llevaron a aperturar una pequeña bodeguita en un local que alquiló para desarrollar esta actividad en el centro de la ciudad y en honor a sus queridos hijos les puso “Los Gemelos”.Diariamente se desempeña en este espacio y ha decidido incrementar su capital de inversión para acrecentar la cantidad y calidad de sus productos, a fin de satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

loans.use: To increase her capital in order to stock her store with a higher quantity and better quality of products.

loans.name: Tuti Alawiyah

texts.en: Tuti Alawiyah, 28, is married to S. and has 1 son. Her husband is a public transportation driver who earns a very small income. So to support her family needs she helps her husband by selling cigarettes, coffee, noodles, mineral water, soap, etc., at her small kiosk, earning $6 a day. At the end of the day she will bring all the goods to her house, because her kiosk's roof is broken; it will leak on a rainy day. She is asking for a loan of $75 to expand her business. She is a member of MBK and is willing to repay this loan within a period of 12 months.

loans.use: Business expansion

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es:
Miriam is gifted in the kitchen, adding her signature flavor to everything she makes; these are the qualities that compelled her to become the chef of her own small restaurant, which she started in her home two years ago. This business idea was born from the fact that her dear husband's salary couldn't cover their children's education or the nutrition of the little ones. Now, with this new income from the restaurant, things have gotten much better at home. She's thankful for the growing clientele and is thinking about expanding the space of her restaurant so that her customers will be more comfortable. With your help, she can make this dream a reality.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

Miriam, es muy hábil en la cocina y su sazón es una de las mejores; estas cualidades la impulsaron a dedicarse a la preparación y venta de comida en un pequeño espacio que acondicionó a manera de restaurante hace dos años, su iniciativa de trabajo se desarrolló debido a que el dinero que percibía su querido esposo era insuficiente para cubrir los gastos de la educación y alimentación de sus pequeños. Ahora con este nuevo ingreso que ha ido obteniendo las cosas en su hogar han mejorado y mucho y está pensando, gracias a la gran acogida de sus clientes, ampliar su espacio de trabajo para ofrecerles mayor comodidad.Tu importante ayuda podrá hacer realidad este anhelo.

loans.use: To buy kitchen utensils and expand the space of her small restaurant.

loans.name: Aurelia

texts.es:
This humble lady's name is Aurelia; today we find her resting after an immense amount of weekend work. She sells cheese and meat at her city's fairs on saturdays and sundays; she collects the products during the week from adjoining towns which are famous for their product's great taste in her native Huancayo. In addition to this activity, she also occupies herself with the breeding and selling of pigs with the help of her two young sons who are still her dependents. Because she is the only source of income for her home, she spends long periods of time outside of the house at work, hoping to better the quality of life of her dear family. Aurelia asks for a loan to invest in purchasing a higher quantity of cheese and meat in order to sell in them full time from her humble home that she has been preparing for over time. Lets make her petition possible so that this humble mother can spend more time in the company of her dear children.

Translated from Spanish by Natalie Kane, Kiva Volunteer.

Ésta humilde mujer se llama Aurelia, ahora la encontramos descansando después de su inmenso trajín de fin de semana. Se dedica a la venta de quesos y carne en las ferias de su ciudad los días sábados y domingos, que recolecta durante la semana de los pueblitos aledaños famosos por el gran sabor de estos productos en su natal Huancayo.Adicionalmente a esta actividad se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerditos con ayuda de sus dos pequeños hijos que aún se encuentran bajo su protección, debido a que ella es el único sostén económico de su hogar permanece largos períodos de tiempo fuera de casa realizando sus acostumbradas actividades, con el deseo de mejorar la calidad de vida de su querida familia.Aurelia, solicita un préstamo para invertirlos en la compra de mayor cantidad de quesos y carne a fin de ofertarlos de manera constante en un humilde espacio de su hogar que ha ido acondicionando con el tiempo. Posibilitemos su petición para que pronto esta humilde madre pueda permanecer más tiempo en compañía de sus queridos hijos.

loans.use: Increase capital to sell a greater quantity of cheese and meat on a full time basis from her home

loans.name: Leslie Patricia

texts.es:
Leslie is a 29 year old entrepreneur. She is also a single mother and lives in the Unidad de Propósito neighborhood. She began her business with the financial support of her mother, and that's how she decided to start her own business and sell electric and gas stoves, as well as parts of the aforementioned items. She has had her business, which has developed over time, for 5 years. She devotes her entire day to it and at the same time manages to care for her 4 year old son. Occasionally she hires 2 young people to sell parts from door-to-door; at the end of the day, they give her the money that they've made. This mother's desire is to increase her sales and to start a repair shop with which she will be able to earn more money and thus ensure a better future for her son. To do this, Leslie is asking for a loan with which she will increase her inventory.

Translated from the Spanish by Susanna Heinz, Kiva Volunteer.

Leslie es una joven empresaria de 29 años de edad, es madre soltera y habita en la colonia Unidad de Propósito. Inició su negocio con el apoyo económico de su madre, es así como decide instalar su propio negocio y vender cocinas eléctricas y de gas, así como respuestos de las mismas. Lleva 5 años de tener su negocio, el cual ha ido desarrollando a lo largo del tiempo, le dedica todo el día al negocio y al mismo tiempo cuida de su pequeño hijo de 4 años, en ocasiones contrata a 2 jóvenes que le venden de manera ambulante los respuestos de cocina y al final del día le dan el dinero que vendieron, es así como también se ayuda. El deseo de esta madre es el de incrementar las ventas de cocinas y el de instalar un taller de reparación con el cual pueda obtener mayores ingresos y así poderle brindar un mejor futuro a su hijo, para esto la señora solicita un préstamo en el cual pueda incrementar el volumen de inventario con el que cuenta.

loans.use: Purchasing stoves with 2 or 3 burners and their accessories

loans.name: Lilian

texts.es:
Lilian is a very hard-working woman, as a result of the economic crisis that her family was going through, at one time she decided to sell Christmas cakes. Little by little and with the support of her husband she would sell some other goods from time to time, until as a result of requests by some clients she decided to sell garmets and cosmetics. This latest activity has given her much satisfaction and now her travel routine and product supply are more constant. Her constant travel to the national capital is in order to acquire one-of-a-kind goods, with that objective and with the desire to increase her sales and quality of life she will also travel to the city of Huaraz to bring from there artisan goods so that the entire population of her native Huancayo can decorate their homes with Peruvian crafts. Her wish to increase the quantity of goods has lead her to ask for a loan in order to acquire more and better quality of products.

Translated from Spanish by Diane Lister, Kiva Volunteer.

Lilian, es una mujer muy empeñosa a raíz de la crisis económica por la que atravesaba su familia, decidió en una época vender panetones por navidad, poco a poco y con apoyo de su esposo vendía algunos artículos ocasionalmente, hasta cuando por solicitud de algunas clientas decidió vender prendas de vestir y cosméticos, esta última actividad le ha otorgado muchas satisfacciones y ahora su rutina de viaje y oferta de productos es más constante.Su desplazamiento constante a la ciudad capital de su país es para adquirir artículos novedosos, con ese objetivo y con el deseo de incrementar sus ventas y calidad de vida ahora también se desplaza a la ciudad de Huaraz para traer desde allí artículos artesanales para que la población entera de su natal Huancayo pueda adornar sus hogares con artesanías peruanas.Su deseo de incrementar la cantidad de artículos la han conducido a solicitar un préstamo para adquirir mayor y mejor calidad de productos.

loans.use: Increased capital to acquire more and better quality goods

loans.name: Marilú

texts.es:
Marilú is a very hard-working and persevering woman. Many years ago she sold plastic articles such as tubs, jugs, washbasins, etc. in street markets in order to support her household practically on her own since she was having serious problems with her husband; because of this she decided shortly after to separate. She decided to invest in the purchase of a car to offer taxi services in her community, ever since then and starting very early in the operation she manages the income that she obtains for the taxi service and has decided to repair the vehicle in order to offer a better and faster service to her clients. With your important support this self-sacrificing mother will be able to set her goal into motion and improve her income in order to raise the quality of life of her family.

Translated from Spanish by Diane Lister, Kiva Volunteer.

Marilú, es una dama muy trabajadora y perseverante, hace muchos años atrás vendía de manera ambulante artículos de plástico como: tinas, lavatorios, jarras, etc, para sostener prácticamente sola su hogar debido a que tenía serios problemas con su esposo, por lo que decidió poco tiempo después separarse. Decidió invertir en la compra de un automóvil para prestar servicios de movilidad a su comunidad, desde entonces desde muy temprano administra los ingresos que obtiene por el alquiler de este bien y ha decidido repararlo para prestar un mejor y rápido servicio a sus clientes.Con tu importante ayuda esta abnegada madre pondrá en marcha su propósito y mejorará los ingresos que obtiene para elevar la calidad de vida de su familia.

loans.use: Repair of the source of income for her beloved family

loans.name: Fidela

texts.es:
Ever since she was very young Fidela has been connected with work in the business sector. Before marrying and relocating to the city of Huancayo, she sold wholesale goods in her native city of Huaraz. As a result of the quality of her products and services she was very well known; nonetheless she had to leave this occupation in order to start her family with the love of her life in another city. Since relocating, things have not been well for her, but her strength and desire for progress has always overcome the difficulties. Because of the economic crisis going on in their household her husband decided to go to another city to work, and comes for short periods to visit them. For this reason she decided to get herself back into business, but this time selling beauty products and clothing. The aspiration to increase her sales area and to offer more and better quality goods leads her to ask for a loan to start up this project. Your important support will contribute to the dreams of this self-sacrificing family mother.

Translated from Spanish by Diane Lister, Kiva Volunteer.

DesD. muy joven Fidela ha estado vinculada a la labor comercial, antes D. contraer matrimonio y radicar en la ciudad D. Huancayo, ofertaba productos en gran mercado D. su natal Huaraz, por la calidad D. sus productos y la calidad D. su servicio era muy conocida, sin embargo tuvo que abandonar esta ocupación para conformar su familia con el gran amor D. su vida en otra ciudad.DesD. que se instalo las cosas no han sido buenas para ella pero siempre su esfuerzo y ganas D. progreso han podido más que las dificultades, su esposo a raíz D. la crisis económica que se vivía en su hogar decidió marcharse a otra ciudad para trabajar en ella y viene por pequeños periodos a visitarlos, por esta razón fue que ella decidió reincorporarse a la actividad comercial pero esta vez vendiendo productos D. belleza y prendas D. vestir.El deseo D. incrementar su radio D. acción y ofrecer mayor cantidad y mejor calidad D. artículos la conducen a solicitar un préstamo para poner en marcha este proyecto.Tu importante ayuda contribuirá con los sueños D. esta abnegada madre D. familia.

loans.use: Increased capital in order to offer more and better quality of goods.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Mr. Alfredo R. is a shoemaker, a trade which he learned from his father, and he started his shoe business ten years ago. He started out by repairing shoes, but his years of experience allowed him to grow and develop his skills, which is why he now makes and sells leather shoes for men and women. His business is located in Villa Flor Norte, in his own neighborhood. He has a good number of customers, such as retailers who purchase great quantities of shoes. This man’s biggest wish is to expand his business, and make it one in which he can hire workers who design, manufacture, and sell a variety of shoe styles in the inland region of the country. Alfredo lives alone, so he uses the majority of his profits to purchase leather, shoe soles, glue, nails, and other materials. For greater security, he needs to rebuild the wall behind his house, which is currently made of aluminum sheeting, so he is requesting a loan in order to construct a concrete wall.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Don Alfredo es de oficio Zapatero, actividad que le enseñó su padre y a la cual se dedica, hace 10 años inició su negocio, comenzó reparando zapatos, los años de experiencia le permitieron desarrollarse y crecer, por lo cual hoy en día elabora y comercializa zapatos de cuero para varón y mujer. Su negocio se encuentra en Villa Flor Norte, barrio donde habita. Cuenta con un buen numero de clientes como lo son los comerciantes de los mercados que le compran grandes cantidades de zapatos. El mayor deseo del señor es el de expandir su negocio, en el cual cuente con trabajadores que le diseñen y le confeccionen una variedad de estilos de zapatos así como el de comercializarlos en todo el interior del país. El señor vive solo, la mayor parte de los ingresos del negocio lo utiliza para comprar cuero, zuela de zapatos, pega, clavos, entre otros insumos. Para su mayor seguridad necesita la construcción de la pared de atrás de su vivienda, la cual esta construida con laminas de zinc, por lo cual solicita un préstamo para poderla levantar de concreto.

loans.use: Purchase of cement, sand, cinder blocks and iron

loans.name: Xiomara Del Carmen

texts.es:
Mrs. Xiomara B. is a 37-year-old married mother of 4 who lives in the Laureles Sur settlement. Her husband is a gardener, but he does not generate enough income to cover all the family expenses. His wife, therefore, set up a mini market in their small home so that she could help move her family forward during the difficult times that the country is experiencing. Xiomara’s biggest sources of income are the ice cream and juices that she sells daily, with which she covers the household expenses. She and her husband wish to continue improving the family’s quality of life. Both parents’ incomes have allowed them to make repairs to their house to the best of their abilities, but they have not been able to finish the construction of the house due to lack of funds. For this reason, Xiomara is requesting a loan in order to build the back wall of their house, which is currently open and unsafe. She would like to close the back so that she may give her family more security and protect their belongings.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

La señora Xiomara tiene 37 años de edad, es casada, tiene 4 hijos pequeños, habita en el asentamiento de Laureles Sur. El esposo de la señora es Jardinero, siendo esta una actividad que no genera suficientes ingresos para cubrir todas las necesidades de esta familia, la señora empezó el negocio de una pulpería en su pequeña vivienda, para poder sacar adelante a su familia, ya que la manutención de sus hijos es costosa debido a lo duro que se encuentra la situación en el país. La mayor fuente de ingresos de este negocio es la venta de helados y refrescos naturales que a diario vende la señora, con lo cual hace frente a todos los gastos del día a día en su hogar. La señora junto a su esposo, desean ir mejorando la calidad de vida de su familia, ambos ingresos de estos padres les ha permitido ir mejorando las condiciones habitacionales de su vivienda, en base a sus posibilidades han ido acondicionando su vivienda, el cual no la tienen terminada debido a la falta de suficientes recursos. Es así que la señora solicita un préstamo para construir el muro de atrás de la vivienda, el cual se encuentra abierto e inseguro, por lo tanto la señora desea cerrarlo, ya que le dará mayor seguridad a su familia y cuidar así sus pertenecías.

loans.use: Buy construction materials to build the back wall of her house

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To invest in merchandise for his business.

loans.name: Cleotilde

texts.es:
"I intend to put up a concrete fence in front of my house in order to make it more secure. I have nieces and nephews now, so I'd like to make my home more secure, but also safer for them. I'm asking for $1000 to put up a concrete fence in front of my house."

Translated by Beatriz Yuste.

“Tengo L. intención D. poner una barda D. concreto al frente D. mi vivienda para que así este más segura, ya tengo nietos y quisiera tener más protegida mi casa pero sobre todo más segura para ellos” Solicito $ 1,000.00 dlls para poner una barda D. concreto enfrente D. mi vivienda

loans.use: To make a concrete fence.

loans.name: Norma Lidia

texts.es:
Norma C. 38-year-old resident of Ticuantepe who has been working the land for 16 years. Her husband is a security guard, which means they have a steady monthly income. They have one son, their pride and joy, who is currently in elementary school and learning the best life lessons from his parents. Their biggest source of income is the fruit of their labor; they grow pineapples and granadia fruit. She is proud of the quality of her crops and of her knowledge. While waiting for the best moment of production, she is requesting a loan in order to maintain her crops, holding off on the harvest until the market indicates that it is the best time to yield the biggest profits. Her dream is to acquire more land and produce more crops in the future because the land that she loves and has been a part of her life has allowed her to move her family forward.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Norma C., es mujer de sol y tierra, con 38 años habita en Ticuantepe y trabaja la tierra de sol a sol desde hace 16 años, su esposo es guarda de seguridad con lo que cuentan con un ingreso fijo mensual, tienen un solo hijo que es todo su mundo y amor el cual esta estudiando Primaria y aprendiendo a la vez las mejores lecciones de vida que sus padres le transmiten. Su mejor ingreso es el que sale del fruto de su trabajo en la tierra en la cual siembran Piña y Granadia, es una mujer orgullosa de la calidad de su producto y de sus conocimientos del mismo, esperando el mejor momento para la producción solicita un préstamo para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo de piña y detener asi la cosecha hasta que sea el momento que el mercado dicte como el adecuado para darle mejores ganancias y es entonces que carbureando la cosecha lograran incentivar la cosecha y tendrá su producto listo para la venta. Su sueño es tener mas adelante mas tierra para producir ya que de la tierra que ama y la vio nacer ha sacado adelante a su familia.

loans.use: Agricultural supplies

loans.name: Candelaria

texts.es:
"A few months ago I began construction on a concrete fence in front of my house. I have some material left and would like to urgently finish the job because my house is very unsafe and I need to protect my family. I'm asking for $800 to finish the construction of a concrete fence in front of my house.

Translated by Beatriz Yuste, Kiva Volunteer.

“Hace algunos meses empece la construcción de una barda enfrente de mi vivienda de hecho todavia tengo algo de material, me urge terminar esa construcción ya que como pueden darse cuenta mi casa es muy insegura y necesito darle protección a mi familia” Solicito $ 800.00 dlls para terminar la construcción de una barda en mi vivienda

loans.use: To build a concrete fence.

loans.name: Carlos Alfonso

texts.es:
Carlos Gutirrez is a young man who has been a grower for 18 years. He lives in the Pablo Calero neighborhood, and is happily married to a hardworking woman who works as a merchant. She has helped him get ahead in life and has given him 4 children, who all work the land like their father. Like most other people in the zone who depend on the pineapple crop, Mr. G. needs to buy agricultural supplies that will allow for the maintenance and production of his crops up to the optimum harvest time. With his earnings, his wife sells different products, and they save some of the money for their daily expenses. With loans, they are able to purchase the agricultural supplies necessary to maintain the quality of their pineapples at harvest time. They will use this loan to purchase agricultural supplies.

Translated from Spanish by Elizabeth Casian, Kiva Volunteer.

Carlos G., es un hombre joven y pequeño agricultor desde hace 18 años, que habita el Barrio Pablo Calero, del pozo 300 vrs arriba es felizmente casado con una mujer muy trabajadora quien como comerciante le ha ayudado a salir adelante y con quien procreo 4 hijos todos ellos se dedican al oficio de su padre don Carlos que es la Agricultura, al igual que muchos dependientes de la producción de piña de esa zona necesita comprar insumos agrícolas que le permitan mantener la producción de piña hasta que sea el momento adecuado de su cosecha, de la ganancia de la cosecha la esposa de este señor se dedica al comercio vario y una parte guardan de reserva para las necesidades cotidianas de tal manera que les permita esperar la ganancia de una cosecha a otra y es con prestamos que logran comprar los insumos necesarios para mantener la calidad de la piña a la hora de la cosecha. Este préstamo es para comprar esos insumos agrícolas.

loans.use: Purchase of agricultural supplies

loans.name: Ruty

texts.en:
A desire to be superior and being a natural born leader are personality attributes of Ruty. She is a woman with a high sense of responsibility that has made her become a multifaceted and creative lady able to go beyond difficult situations. After watching her children become honest men, prepared to face life, she has started social work and decided to be become the driving force for a children dining room for her community, she always is quick to help her neighbors. Helping for Ruty, gives her great satisfaction. She feels that her calling is social work. When she was young, she wanted to study and advanced but wasn’t able to go to university/college. Although many would say that it is already too late to study in college, this is not an obstacle for her. In order to pay for her home expenses and to cover the costs of a procedure for one of her children, she works weaving sweaters on a machine, while her husband is a driver for a small buss. She has a strong desire to continue her work, and therefore needs a loan to acquire a greater quantity of yarn and to repair parts of her knitting machine. With yur loan, this hard-working mother will continue with her supportive social work, weaving the dreams of her family with colorful wool.

Translated from Spanish by Jenny Dean, Kiva Volunteer.

Los deseos de superación y las habilidades natas para el liderazgo son atributos de la personalidad de Ruty. Ella es una mujer con alto sentido de responsabilidad característica que la ha llevado a convertirse en una dama multifacética y creativa para superar situaciones difíciles. Después de ver a sus hijos convertidos en hombres de bien, ya preparados para enfrentar la vida, se ha dedicado a ser obras de bien social y decidió convertirse en la impulsora de un comedor infantil para su comunidad, siempre está presta a ayudar a sus vecinas si se trata de ayuda solidaria, para ella ayudar es su gran satisfacción y siente que su vocación es el trabajo social, carrera que quiso estudiar de muy joven y postuló una vez pero no pudo ingresar a la universidad y aunque muchos dirían que ya es muy tarde para estudiar esto no es un obstáculo para ella. Para sostener los gastos que genera su hogar y para cubrir los costos del trámite de titulación de uno de sus hijos, se dedica a tejer chompas a máquina, mientras su esposo se dedica al transporte de pasajeros en un pequeño bus. Muy deseosa de seguir con su labor solicita un préstamo para adquirir mayor cantidad de materia prima y para reparar las fallas de su máquina de tejer.Con tu ayuda esta trabajadora madre continuará con su labor solidaria, tejiendo los sueños de su familia con lana de muchos colores.

loans.use: To Buy a Greater Amount of Product to Continue Her Work.

payments.comment: Correction due to underpayment for business 38674

loans.name: Cecilia

texts.en:
Cecilia works at her husband’s company, carrying out sun parasols repairs, in order to sell them at the local market. Each week she buys the metal framework of the parasols and her husband repairs these frames, she then verifies that they are acceptable. Once acceptable, she puts bright and gaudy color fabrics on them. This daily activity and the sale of the parasols at local markets allows Cecilia and her family to survive. However, the family struggles and they wish to improve their difficult economic situation. Cecilia and her husband would like to form a business where they could sell parasols wholesale, so that their 3 children can continue to study and in the future become business professionals. Cecilia remembers that 12 years ago, she started working with her husband in parasols. She says they have always overcome the problems that happen to business folk like low sale, little profit, among others. In spite of these hardships, they are very happy because they believe that have a unique position in the market as one of the most important producers of parasols, which they think will be an advantage to their future sales. Cecilia wants to increase the production of their parasols and therefore needs increased capital, hence needing a loan. Please help this self-sacrificing mother get what she so longs for.

Translated from Spanish by Jenny Dean, Kiva Volunteer.

Cecilia, trabaja en compañía de su esposo, realizando reparaciones de sombrillas de sol, para luego venderlas en el mercado local. Cada semana compra el armazón de metal de las sombrillas y su esposo se dedica a reparar estos armazones y ella a verificar que estén bien, luego de haber culminado este proceso les pone telas de vistosos y llamativos colores, día a día esta actividad permite que Cecilia y su familia tengan el sustento diario ya que depende del trabajo de toda la semana, la venta de las mismas en las ferias locales. Los deseos de que progresen en familia y mejoren su difícil situación económica la motivan a que tenga como meta formar una empresa y poder vender al por mayor estas sombrillas, a fin de que sus 3 hijos puedan seguir estudiando y a futuro se conviertan en grandes profesionales. Cecilia recuerda que hace 12 años empezó a dedicarse junto a su esposo a esta actividad y que con la constancia de ambos han superado los problemas que siempre aparecen cuando uno es comerciante, como las bajas ventas, poca ganancia, entre otras a pesar de estos inconvenientes están muy contentos porque se han posicionado en el mercado y son conocidos como uno de los proveedores de sombrillas más importantes y para ellos esto se ha convertido en una ventaja para sus ventas. Ella desea aumentar la producción de sombrillas y para esto requiere de un aumento de capital para lo cual solicita un préstamo. Posibilitemos su petición para que esta abnegada madre consiga lo que tanto anhela.

loans.use: Capital Gain to Increase Weekly Production.

loans.name: Leonor

texts.en:
Leonor, is a very industrious, multifaceted, and enterprising woman, who has always sought a way to provide to her family with the necessary things that they need to develop fully. Therefore, since she was very young, she has been selling different articles of clothing. She is a very responsible and dedicated mother to her 5 children. On the weekends, with the aid of her older daughter and her husband she sells chicken soup, from her in-laws’ house. During the week, she is dedicated her clothing sales (and when the opportunity arises, footwear sales) in a small rented space near her house. For a year, Leonor has sold food and also other articles of clothing locally. Before she was trying to sell groceries, but found that it produced low profits. Leonor has dreamt of owning a car and has now decided to invest her savings to buy a car, so she can have transportation. However, this dream is in the distant future (as she cannot afford it yet), therefore, she will continue to work for the benefit and welfare of her beloved family. She needs a loan to increase the quantity and variety of articles of clothing that she offers in order to increase her profits and eventually reach her dream.

Translated from Spanish by Jenny Dean, Kiva Volunteer.

Leonor, es una mujer emprendedora, multifacética y muy hacendosa, siempre ha buscado la manera de proveer a su familia lo necesario para que se desarrollen plenamente, por esa razón su vida siempre ha estado ligada, desde muy joven, al comercio de diferentes artículos que han albergado una experiencia positiva en el mundo de las ventas; ahora ya es una madre de familia muy responsable y dedicada a sus 5 hijos. Los fines de semana vende caldo de gallina, de cabeza y mondongo en la casa de sus suegros con la ayuda de su hija mayor y su esposo, los días en los que no desarrolla esta actividad se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir en un pequeño espacio que alquiló muy cerca de su casa y en oportunidades aprovecha las temporadas para vender calzados. Leonor ya lleva un año dedicándose a la venta de comida y también de prendas de vestir en un local, antes se dedicaba a la venta de abarrotes, pero decidió ya no hacerlo por las bajas ganancias que le producían. Ha decidido invertir los ahorros que le han permitido obtener sus actividades económicas para comprarse un auto para incursionar en el transporte urbano y aunque este anhelo está todavía un poco lejano de concretar, se ha propuesto seguir trabajando para beneficio y bienestar de su querida familia. En esta oportunidad solicita un préstamo para incrementar la cantidad y variedad de prendas de vestir que oferta a fin de acrecentar sus ganancias para pronto alcanzar su sueño.

loans.use: Capital gain to increase the quantity and variety of articles of clothing that she offers.

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty’s Prepared Food Sales become an important source of income for her family. She is sixty years old although she acts like she is twenty. She is very kind and communicative. The success of her prepared food sales in largely due to the suggestions of her beloved son who works in a hospital, her clients who day after day refer others, due to easy payment terms, and due to the clean and orderly distribution of the food every afternoon. Due to the high degree of client satisfaction, her orders have increased faster than she thought they would. As a result, she needs a greater quantity of containers, kitchen utensils; covers and food, to continue with her business. Consequently, she needs a loan to quickly acquire these products in order to please her growing clientele.

Translated from Spanish by Jenny Dean, Kiva Volunteer.

La buena sazón de Doña Betty, le ha permitido convertirse en una fuente importante de financiamiento para el bienestar de su familia. Ella tiene sesenta años y pesar de su avanzada edad se desenvuelve como si tuviera veinte, es muy amable y comunicativa nos comenta que el éxito que tiene la venta de sus platillos es en principio gracias a los comentarios de su querido hijo que labora en un hospital y luego de sus clientes que día a día la recomiendan con otros, debido a la facilidad de pago, a la limpieza y orden en cuanto a los repartos que realiza todas las tardes. Ha observado con mucha satisfacción que los pedidos se incrementan mucho más rápido de lo que ella algún día pensó y tiene la necesidad de adquirir mayor cantidad de recipientes, utensilios de cocina, cubiertos y alimentos, para continuar con su esforzada labor, por esta razón acude en búsqueda de tu ayuda para adquirir pronto lo necesario a fin de satisfacer y complacer a sus queridos comensales. queridos comensales.

loans.use: To Buy Food, Covers, Kitchen Utensils and Containers.

loans.name: Norma

texts.en:
Norma and her husband have always sought a way to raise their 4 children and to offer them a good education. Therefore, nearly all their life, they have been selling different articles, and 7 years ago they began to sell fruit wholesale. Norma's husband travels constantly to the countryside of Peru where he is able to obtain a large amount of fruit which he sends to his wife. Their clients are always pleased due to the sweetness and quality of the fruit. The demand of this fruit has been affected by innumerable reasons and their profits have diminished considerably, nevertheless they do not lose hope that their sales will increase with the help of capital to their business.

Translated from Spanish by Jenny Dean, Kiva Volunteer.

Norma y su esposo siempre han buscado la manera de sostener a sus 4 hijos y brindarles una buena educación, por esa razón es que casi toda su vida han estado dedicados al comercio de diferentes artículos, y hace 7 años a la comercialización de frutas al por mayor. Su esposo viaje constantemente a la selva de su país para enviar desde este lugar gran cantidad de frutas hasta el lugar en el que aguarda su esposa, siempre conquistando a sus clientes con la dulzura de los frutos que oferta en su espacio de ventas. La demanda de estos productos se han visto afectados por innumerables razones y sus ganancias han disminuido considerablemente, sin embargo no pierden las esperanzas de incrementar sus ventas con la ayuda de una inyección de capital a su labor.

loans.use: To Increase Capital to Offer a Better Quality and Variety of Fruit

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
